title: Apple opens gates to $1.1 trillion in app payments — for a steep price
description: Apple is opening up its iPhone walled garden a crack, allowing U.S. app makers to use third-party payment systems — but it is charging developers a pretty penny to venture outside its gates.

title: Concerns rise China might reach moon before NASA’s return
description: A year-long delay in a planned mission to send astronauts to orbit the moon prompts worries among members of Congress.

title: Samsung’s new Galaxy S24 translates live phone calls with AI
description: Does anyone really need a smartphone to make live phone calls with AI? The Korean electronics giant is making its case for it in its new Galaxy S24 smartphone.

title: We’ve all looked lousy in photos. These tips can help.
description: Cameras influence the way we see the world — and ourselves. These tips can help you control the way you look in photos.
